descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/YMz86Ai.png[/img][/url][/center]==================
Meeko The Husky
==================
Upload images of your adventures with Meeko! :)

[b][u]This mod uses scripts.[/u][/b]

============
Description:
============
Just edited Meeko and he is a husky now!
I didn't edit any other dogs.

I've added essential version too. The scripts are included in both versions.

You can find Meeko at [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Meeko%27s_Shack]Meeko's Shack[/url].

========
Install:
========
Extract all the files into your Skyrim/Data folder. And remember to enable the mod! :)
You can also install using the NMM.

=============
Requirements:
=============
Dawnguard DLC.

================
Version history:
================
1.1: Fixed the dialogue issue. You can now tell Meeko to "wait" and "dismiss" him.

1.0: Initial Release.

============
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?]Forever Free[/url]:
============
Is a modder resource made by mysticentity, by adding it to my description means that this mod will always be free. :)
author: aBaDmAn91
